definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="n" type="Number">n</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:the_one</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:TheOneUltimate</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block inline="false" type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">FLAME</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.1</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
